00097 static inline
00098  Bool UART_getDataReadyStatus(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00099 {
00100     Uint16 DatRdy = 0;
00101 
00102     DatRdy = CSL_FEXT(hUart->uartRegs->LSR,UART_LSR_DR);
00103     if( DatRdy )
00104         return TRUE;
00105     return FALSE;
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00150 static inline
00151 Bool UART_getXmitHoldRegEmptyStatus(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00152 {
00153     Uint16 XmitRdy = 0;
00154 
00155     XmitRdy = CSL_FEXT(hUart->uartRegs->LSR,UART_LSR_THRE);
00156 
00157     if( XmitRdy )
00158         return TRUE;
00159     return FALSE;
00160 }

00203 static inline
00204 CSL_Status UART_getRecvorResetStatus(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00205 {
00206     Uint16 UrRst = 0;
00207 
00208     UrRst = CSL_FEXT(hUart->uartRegs->PWREMU_MGMT,UART_PWREMU_MGMT_URRST);
00209     if( UrRst )
00210         return FALSE;
00211     return TRUE;
00212 
00213 }
00255 static inline
00256 CSL_Status UART_getXmitorResetState(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00257 {
00258     Uint16 UtRst = 0;
00259 
00260     UtRst = CSL_FEXT(hUart->uartRegs->PWREMU_MGMT,UART_PWREMU_MGMT_UTRST);
00261     if( UtRst )
00262         return FALSE;
00263     return TRUE;
00264 
00265 }
00314 static inline
00315 CSL_UartXferMode UART_getModeOfTransfer(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00316 {
00317     Uint16 UtRst = 0;
00318 
00319     UtRst = CSL_FEXT(hUart->uartRegs->FCR,UART_IIR_FIFOEN);
00320 
00321     if( 0 == UtRst )
00322     {
00323         return CSL_UART_NON_FIFO_MODE;
00324     }
00325     if (3 == UtRst)
00326     {
00327         return CSL_UART_FIFO_MODE;
00328     }
00329     return CSL_UART_MODE_UNDEFINED;
00330 
00331 }
00373 static inline
00374 CSL_Status UART_setToIntMode(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00375 {
00376     CSL_Status status = CSL_SOK;
00377     if( NULL == hUart )
00378     {
00379         return CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE;
00380     }
00381     hUart->opmode = UART_INTERRUPT;
00382     return status;
00383 }static inline
00423 CSL_Status UART_setToPollMode(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00424 {
00425     CSL_Status status = CSL_SOK;
00426     hUart->opmode = UART_POLLED;
00427     return status;
00428 }
00429 
00477 static inline
00478 CSL_Status UART_enableFreeRun(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00479 {
00480     CSL_Status status = CSL_SOK;
00481     CSL_FINST(hUart->uartRegs->PWREMU_MGMT, UART_PWREMU_MGMT_FREE,RUN);
00482     return status;
00483 }
00484 
00537 static inline
00538 CSL_Status UART_disableFreeRun(CSL_UartHandle hUart)
00539 {
00540     CSL_Status status = CSL_SOK;
00541     CSL_FINST(hUart->uartRegs->PWREMU_MGMT,UART_PWREMU_MGMT_FREE,STOP);
00542     return status;
00543 }
